captions.text:
-Ah, nothing like cozying up
next to a stove burner

-Yo, I'm freezing out here.
Can I chill with you guys?

-You're an icicle, dude.
You're supposed to be cold.

-But you CAN'T be warm.
You're an icicle.

What? Like you guys never
"thaw" that coming. [laughs]

-So this is what
being warm is like.

so today I woke up, looked in
the mirror, and asked myself...

-Exactly. Lousy weather,
living in a gutter, it's awful.

I've got to hang with
my relatives all the time.

-When are you gonna find
an ice girl and settle down?

-So trust me, being indoors
is absolute paradise.

-My eye just dripped
down my face.

I can't get up. Too weak.
Help would be nice.

-Sure thing, icicle.
I'll give you a hand.

-(Icicle) Ow-ow-ow!
Ooh-ooh, hot, hot, hot, ooh!

-See? This is exactly why
I didn't want him inside.

-Uh-oh. I'm gonna fall.
It's too high. It's too high.

-Poor dude's caught in
a vicious ice cycle. [laughs]

Okay, I know that was a stretch.
I'm sorry.

-Aah! Open the window!
Open the window!

How are you gonna open
the window with no ha--

-[tingles] Is it just me or
is it a little cold in here?

-You're an icicle;
you're supposed to be cold!

Stop it!
-Better lay off him, Pear.

title: Annoying Orange - Icicle Insanity (Ft. Kevin Brueck and Katers17)
